"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "nkan no hom nantseew mu dɛ mbrɛ ɔfa wiadze yi mber ho
, #Kol 2.13": dɛ mbrɛ wimu tum panyin no tse
column4: sunsum a ɔyɛ edwuma sesei wɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ asoɔdzen no mu."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Nkyɛ hɛn nyina so tse hɔn mu bɔ hɛn bra wɔ honam akɔndɔ mu
, #Kol 2.13": na yɛyɛɛ dza honam nye adwen pɛ
column4: na yɛnam hɛn awosu mu yɛɛ nkorɔfo a Nyankopɔn ebufuw wɔ hɔn do dɛ hɔn a wɔaka no so:"

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "naaso Nyankopɔn a n’ehumbɔbɔr dɔɔ so no
, #Kol 2.13": nam no dɔ kɛse a ɔdze dɔɔ hɛn"

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "wɔ ber a nna yɛyɛ ewufo wɔ mfom mu no
, #Kol 2.13": ama yɛnye Kraest enya nkwa; (adom do na wɔnam agye hom nkwa.)"

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Oenyan hɛn aka no ho
, #Kol 2.13": na ɔama yɛnye no atsena sorsor hɔ wɔ Kraest Jesus mu;"

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "ama mbersantsen a ɔreba no mu oeeyi n’adom ahonya mbordo no akyerɛ
, #Kol 2.13": wɔ ayamuyie a ɔayɛ hɛn wɔ Kraest Jesus mu no."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Na adom na wɔdze nam gyedzi do agye hom nkwa; na ommfi homankasa
"ommfi ndwuma mu
"Na yɛyɛ n’edwinsa a ɔbɔɔ hɛn Kraest Jesus mu maa ndwuma pa a Nyankopɔn siesiei too hɔ dɛ yɛnnantsew mu no."
"Dɛm ntsi hom nkaa dɛ
, #Kol 2.13": hom a nkyɛ nkan no hom yɛ Amanamamfo wɔ honam mu
column4: ma hɔn a wɔfrɛ hɔnho Twatsiatwafo
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔdze nsa ara gyan twa no honam mu no frɛ hom Monomonomfo no."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Hom nkaa bio dɛ ber no
column4: na hom yɛ ananaben a hom mmfora Israel amamba
column5: na hom yɛ ahɔho wɔ anohoba ahyɛmu horow no ho
column7: eso hom nnyi Nyankopɔn bi wɔ wiadze."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Na afei dze
column4: ma Kraest bɔgya no dze hom a nkyɛ hom wɔ ekyirekyir no abɛn."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Na ɔnoara ankasa nye hɛn asomdwee
, #Kol 2.13": ɔno a ɔayɛ ebien yi adze kor
column4: na nankasa no honam nyimpadua mu oedwuruw fasu a otwa hɛn ntamu yɛ hɛn atamfo no egu famu."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Oegu mbra no mu ahyɛdze nye nhyehyɛɛ no nyina
, #Kol 2.13": na ɔdze hɔn beenu nyina abɔ nyimpa fofor kor wɔ nankasa no mu

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "na ɔnam ne mbeamudua no do aka ebien nyina abɔ mu ayɛ nyimpadua kor ama Nyankopɔn
, #Kol 2.13": na ɔdze mbeamudua kor yi ara so eku nyitan nyina."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Na ɔbae bɛkaa asomdwee ho nsɛmpa kyerɛɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyir
"na ɔnam no mu na hɛn beenu nyina nam Sunsum kor mu enya kwan wɔ Egya no nkyɛn."
"Na afei hom nnyɛ ahɔho nye amamforafo bio
, #Kol 2.13": mbom hom yɛ ahotseweefo na kuromamfo nye Nyankopɔn fiemba;"

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "wɔdze hom esi asomafo nye nkɔnhyɛfo no fapem do a Kraest Jesus nankasa nye kutuwdo bo tsitsir."
"No mu na dza woesi no nyina keka si enyim a
, #Kol 2.13": orinyin akɛyɛ Nyankopɔn asɔrdan krɔnkrɔn wɔ Ewuradze mu."

"Na hom so a nkyɛ hom yɛ ewufo wɔ hom m: "Ɔnoara so no mu na worisi hom so ayɛ hom Nyankopɔn ne tsenabea wɔ Sunsum mu."
